member.summary: Resends the very last command being sent.
member.returns: A CommandInfo object that represents the response command from the controller.

member.name: M:AioiSystems.Lightstep.ControllerBase.GetCommand
member.summary: Gets the command received from the controller from the receiving buffer.
member.returns: A CommandInfo object that represents the receiving command. If there is no receiving command "null" will be returned.
member.remarks: An exception will not occur if implemented without connecting with the controller.

member.summary: Set the license key.

member.name: M:AioiSystems.Lightstep.ControllerBase.GetLogMessages
member.summary: Gets all the acquired log messages from the queue.
member.returns: An array of the obtained log data. Returns "null" if no log data is obtained.
member.remarks: Can be obtained only if the LogMessageRaised event handler is defined. If the event handler is not defined, log is not stored in the queue.

member.summary: Occurs when a command is received from the controller.

member.summary: Occurs when log data is added.

member.summary: Occurs when the asynchronous operation of controller disconnection is complete.

member.summary: Occurs when the asynchronous operation of controller disconnection is complete.

member.summary: Occurs when an error occurs during processing of the internal thread.

member.name: E:AioiSystems.Lightstep.ControllerBase.EndSendCommand
member.summary: Occurs when the processing of the asynchronous transmission of a command is complete.

member.summary: Gets or sets the waiting time in milliseconds for the asynchronous transmission until completion.

member.summary: Gets or sets the object of marshaling the calling of various event handlers.

member.summary: Gets or sets the timeout time in milliseconds for sending and receiving a command.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value that represents the binary conversion mode.

member.summary: Starts automatic polling.

member.summary: Stops automatic polling.

member.summary: Calculates the checksum.

member.summary: Gets or sets the timeout time in milliseconds for sending and receiving a command.
member.value: Timeout time (in milliseconds). The default value is 3000 milliseconds.

member.name: P:AioiSystems.Lightstep.Rs232cController.IsPolling
member.summary: Gets the status whether the automatic polling is implementing.
member.value: "true" if during automatic polling. Otherwise, "false".

member.name: P:AioiSystems.Lightstep.Rs232cController.Com
member.summary: Gets or sets the COM port number of the controller
member.value: COM port number. The default value is 1.

member.name: P:AioiSystems.Lightstep.Rs232cController.BaudRate
member.summary: Gets or sets the baud rate.
member.value: Baud rate. The default value is 9600.

member.name: P:AioiSystems.Lightstep.Rs232cController.DataBits
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of stop bits per byte.
member.value: The length of data bit. The default value is 8.

member.name: P:AioiSystems.Lightstep.Rs232cController.StopBits
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of stop bits per byte.
member.value: A value representing the number of stop bits. The default value is "One".

member.name: P:AioiSystems.Lightstep.Rs232cController.Parity
member.summary: Gets or sets the parity-checking protocol.
member.value: A value that represents the parity-checking protocol. The default value is "None".

member.name: P:AioiSystems.Lightstep.Rs232cController.PollingLogEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets the value indicating whether to log when polling commands are used.
member.value: Sets to "true" if you want to save all the polling commands to the log. Otherwise, "false". The default value is "false".
member.remarks: Polling command is sent and received at the interval set by the PollingInterval property. Logs may become large if set to "true". If set to "false", only the command when there is a response of the light module will be recorded in the log.

member.name: P:AioiSystems.Lightstep.Rs232cController.PollingInterval
member.summary: Gets or sets the polling interval.
member.value: Polling interval (in milliseconds). The default value is 100 milliseconds.
member.remarks: It is not possible to change the value of automatic polling status.

member.name: T:AioiSystems.Lightstep.RepeatableCommand
member.summary: Provides the functionalities to assist in building a repeatable command.

member.name: F:AioiSystems.Lightstep.RepeatableCommand._repeatData
member.summary: Represents the data of the repeat portion that has been added.

member.summary: Adds the data of the repeatable portion.

member.name: M:AioiSystems.Lightstep.RepeatableCommand.Clear
member.summary: Deletes all the data of the repetition portion that has been added.

member.name: M:AioiSystems.Lightstep.RepeatableCommand.CreateCommand(System.String,AioiSystems.Lightstep.RepeatableCommand.SplitType,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates commands that are split into the appropriate size.
member.param: Header portion of the repeatable command.

member.name: M:AioiSystems.Lightstep.RepeatableCommand.CreateCommand(System.String,AioiSystems.Lightstep.RepeatableCommand.SplitType)
member.summary: Creates commands that are split into the appropriate size.
member.param: Header portion of the repeatable command.
member.remarks: Split size is set to 128 when split type is RepeatCount, or 1015 when split type is ByteSize.

member.name: T:AioiSystems.Lightstep.RepeatableCommand.SplitType
member.summary: Represents the splitting method.

member.name: F:AioiSystems.Lightstep.RepeatableCommand.SplitType.ByteSize
member.summary: Determines the position divided by the number of bytes.

member.name: F:AioiSystems.Lightstep.RepeatableCommand.SplitType.RepeatCount
member.summary: Determines the split position by the number of repeatable patterns.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Rs232cCommandInfo class.

member.name: P:AioiSystems.Lightstep.Rs232cCommandInfo.CheckSum
member.summary: Gets or sets the checksum of the command.
member.value: The value of checksum. Represents a value from 0x30 to 0x39. If you do not have a checksum, it will be represented by 0xFF.

member.summary: Represents the data of the EndSendCommand event.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance.
member.param: An exception object occurs during transmission.
The value that represents the next operation.
User-defined data associated with the command.

member.name: P:AioiSystems.Lightstep.EndSendCommandEventArgs.ErrorNextAction
member.summary: Specifies a value that represents the processing to be performed after the event handler when an error occurs.
member.value: A member of NextActions enumeration that represents the next process.
member.remarks: This value is ignored when normal.

member.name: P:AioiSystems.Lightstep.EndSendCommandEventArgs.Tag
member.summary: Gets or sets the user-defined data associated with the command.
member.value: User-defined data associated with the command.

member.name: P:AioiSystems.Lightstep.EndSendCommandEventArgs.Error
member.summary: Gets the object of an exception occurred.
member.value: An exception object. "null" if the connection is successful.

member.name: P:AioiSystems.Lightstep.EndSendCommandEventArgs.CommandSent
member.summary: Gets the transmission command.

member.name: P:AioiSystems.Lightstep.EndSendCommandEventArgs.CommandResponded
member.summary: Gets the response command.
member.value: A CommandInfo object that represents the response command.

member.name: T:AioiSystems.Lightstep.LogFileSettings
member.summary: Represents the settings for automatic logging.

member.name: P:AioiSystems.Lightstep.LogFileSettings.LogSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum size of the log file.
member.value: Maximum byte size of the log file. The default value is 1M bytes.

member.name: P:AioiSystems.Lightstep.LogFileSettings.LogName
member.summary: Gets or sets the "any text" embedded in the log file name.
member.value: "Any text" that embedded in the file name.
member.remarks: The file name always starts with "ls_", you can set the "any text" next. The default value is a zero-length string.

member.name: P:AioiSystems.Lightstep.LogFileSettings.LogDirectory
member.summary: Gets or sets the base directory to save the log.
member.value: The base directory to save the log. The default value is "My Documents" folder.

member.name: P:AioiSystems.Lightstep.LogFileSettings.Expiration
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of days to keep the log files.
member.value: Number of retention days. The default value is 14.

member.name: P:AioiSystems.Lightstep.LogFileSettings.Enabled
member.summary: Gets or sets the value that represents the valid/invalid state of the log.
member.value: "true" if you want to enable logging. Otherwise "false". The default value is "true".
